author: tersec
content: Seems like `mergemock` is SSZ-serializing `BaseFeePerGas` as big-endian, but https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/ssz/simple-serialize.md#uintn specifies it's little-endian (at least, it  runs `hh.PutBytes(e.BaseFeePerGas[:])` and when I dump the contents of that array, it's in big-endian format)

author: tersec
content: it's part of the cause of this

author: tersec
content: the other part is that it's not correctly (or at least consistently with Nimbus, which, in theory, has a well-tested SSZ serialization) htr'ing `ExtraData`

author: ralexstokes
content: yeah <@543900561460822016>  is working on fixing it

content: i think there were some bugs in the underlying ssz lib
